We went here our last night in Barcelona.  From the outside you might wonder if you should go in. GO IN!  it is the greatest experience. Homemade vermut.  Amazing tapas.  Small quaint tables.  Family takes care of the patrons.  The serve your vermut with old school seltzer for squirting into your glass.  If you want the Quintessential vermut bar experience, this is your spot.
